languages.text: "Когитатор нужно остановить — ради тех, кто еще жив, там, внизу!"

traits.locale_text: "Когитатор нужно остановить — ради тех, кто еще жив, там, внизу!"

languages.text: "We need to stop the cogitator. For the sake of the people still alive down there!"
languages.original_text: "Когитатор нужно остановить — ради тех, кто еще жив, там, внизу!"

traits.locale_text: "We need to stop the cogitator. For the sake of the people still alive down there!"
"We need to stop the cogitator. For the sake of the people still alive down there!"
"We need to stop the cogitator. For the sake of the people still alive down there!"
"We need to stop the cogitator. For the sake of the people still alive down there!"

languages.text: “我们必须让这台沉思者停下来，为了下面那些仍然活着的人！”
languages.original_text: "We need to stop the cogitator. For the sake of the people still alive down there!"

traits.locale_text: “我们必须让这台思考器停下来，为了下面那些仍然活着的人！”

languages.text: «¡Tenemos que detener el cogitador por la gente que aún sigue viva ahí abajo!».
languages.original_text: "We need to stop the cogitator. For the sake of the people still alive down there!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Tenemos que detener el cogitador por la gente que aún sigue viva ahí abajo!».

languages.text: 「考算機を止めねばならない。まだあそこで生きている人々のために！」
languages.original_text: "We need to stop the cogitator. For the sake of the people still alive down there!"

traits.locale_text: 「考算機を止めねばならない。まだあそこで生きている人々のために！」

languages.text: "Wir müssen dem Cogitator Einhalt gebieten. Für die Menschen, die dort unten noch leben!"
languages.original_text: "We need to stop the cogitator. For the sake of the people still alive down there!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir müssen dem Cogitator Einhalt gebieten. Für die Menschen, die dort unten noch leben!"

languages.text: « Nous devons arrêter le cogitateur, pour sauver les habitants des niveaux inférieurs qui sont toujours en vie ! »
languages.original_text: "We need to stop the cogitator. For the sake of the people still alive down there!"

traits.locale_text: « Nous devons arrêter le cogitateur, pour sauver les habitants des niveaux inférieurs qui sont toujours en vie ! »

languages.text: "Kavramsayarı durdurmalıyız. Aşağıda yaşayan insanlar için yapmalıyız bunu!"
languages.original_text: "We need to stop the cogitator. For the sake of the people still alive down there!"

traits.locale_text: “Kavramsayarı durdurmalıyız. Aşağıda yaşayan insanlar için yapmalıyız bunu!”
